column1:
Odeinoichus,"2017-08-23T16:36:41.237Z","Build an Army to Ride into Battle","

Set #30376 Knighton Rider: A free offering from LEGO Shop @ Home in January of 2017 we’ll discuss the pros and cons and then the final thoughts on this set.
Pros:

column2: Interesting and fun little model.
Modular play feature capable of clipping onto Battle Armour sets.
Knight Minifigure generic army builder with double-sided facial print for diverse display options when multiples owned. Includes lance accessory.

column1: Cons:

column2: Limited accessories for the Minifigure.
No NEXO Powers included.

column1: Overall opinion

A decent offering from LEGO for a freebie, mildly recommended for fans of the theme or army builders. Casual fans may prefer the different offerings with more interesting models such as Motor Horse and Shrunken Headquarters.
